main event: One round object, orange and red in color, was observed at an altitude of approximately 40,000 feet.
interesting points: The object exhibited no movement and was detected by a flash through the trees., The observation lasted for forty-five seconds., The sighting occurred in Cartersville, Virginia., The report mentioned insufficient data for further evaluation., There was no tail or exhaust visible from the object.
sighted object: one round object, orange and red in color
